# [[museum]] {{zh-mw|家}}

====Usage notes====
Though {{zh-l|博物館}} and {{zh-l|博物院|tr=bówùyuàn}} are both translated into English as ''museum'', it should be noted that the former refers to a museum of any size, while the latter is usually reserved for museums built to a large scale.
